abstract: BP said Tuesday that its profit fell 66 percent in the third quarter after it set aside more money to cover costs related to the Gulf of Mexico oil spill.
snippet: BP said Tuesday that its profit fell 66 percent in the third quarter after it set aside more money to cover costs related to the Gulf of Mexico oil spill.
lead_paragraph: BP said on Tuesday that its profit fell 66 percent in the third quarter after it set aside more money to cover costs related to the Gulf of Mexico oil spill, Julia Werdigier reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: BP Profit Falls 66% on Oil Spill Charges
